Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory827.jpg'}
{3: "Anyone who has turned 18 and has no major criminal record can make friends with people using Gestalt's matching system."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory427.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Trillard', 3: 'In a society increasingly connected through communication rather than personal relationships, providing convenience for citizens to communicate is our duty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Trillard', 3: "Isn't it our job to bridge gaps for strangers so they can break out of their old circles?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says Trillard, who has been actively promoting civilian use of certain Gestalt functions.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory526.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Gestalt's matching system, huh...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe was going to turn down this offer, being one of those who aren't entirely familiar with breaking out of their old circles to make friends with complete strangers."}
{3: "Establishing one's identity before communication is a deeply ingrained habit since primitive times and isn't easy to break."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: 'Might as well try. Not bad if you end up with a couple of new friends, no?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'I mean, none of your friends from school or the racing club chose to become soldiers, did they?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'How did you know?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "I didn't even know your life was so rich until Ballard told me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Did you look into me?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Watanabe looks at Ballard in disbelief.'}
{2: 'Ballard', 3: "Occupational habit, and you didn't exactly hide it.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: 'You never told me any of this, so I was actually quite surprised when I first learned about these things.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "I'm just glad you didn't turn into one of those people who shave both sides of their head, paint their eyes black, and wear clothes that look splattered with paint.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "That's quite a huge mix of several generations' worth of stereotypes right there...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "But you'll definitely need friends if you're trying to go down this path of your own choosing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Which is why you want to give the Gestalt matching system a try.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory514.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Just give it a shot.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie1New.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie2New.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie3New.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie4New.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie1New.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie2New.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie3New.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiLianjie4New.prefab'}
{3: 'Through his terminal, Watanabe accesses the matching system in a breeze.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Dear citizen, hello and welcome to the Gestalt matching system.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'You are exercising your legal rights under Chapter 3, Article 291 of the Citizen Welfare Act.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Please read the following terms and proceed after confirmation.'}
{3: 'Watanabe quickly scrolls through the long privacy terms and usage rules and presses confirm.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Retrieving citizen database. This will take a few moments... Confirming information... Matching...'}
{3: 'Before the AI says another word, Watanabe interrupts it with the confirm button.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Matching complete. Would you like to enable privacy mode?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Hmm... sure, since I'll be interacting with strangers, no?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Understood, privacy mode enabled.'}
{2: 'Gestalt', 3: 'Thank you for using the Gestalt matching system. Enjoy yourself.'}
{3: 'After a brief system tone, a greeting comes through the speaker.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Hello, can you hear me?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory211.png'}
{3: "Five days have passed since Watanabe's birthday, and he's ready to head to the Oasis new recruit training camp."}
{3: "It's a series of modern training camps in the desert, and Watanabe is heading to the second squad."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shin', 3: "Sorry, I can't see you off.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's okay, Dad. I'm not going to kindergarten.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: 'Seeing family members off to the military has been a long-standing tradition in the family.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shin', 3: "I believe you have what it takes to cope with whatever comes your way, but I'll still be blessing you from above.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...Never thought I'd hear something so sappy coming from you, Dad.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll just chalk this up to you being sentimental out in space. Wait for my good news.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'After ending the satellite call, Watanabe is about to put his suitcase on the luggage rack...'}
{3: 'When someone beside him lends a hand.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Thanks.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You're welcome.", 3: '102'}
{3: 'The person sits back in their seat.'}
{3: "The person looks familiar, but Watanabe can't seem to recall who they are no matter how hard he tries."}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Are you reporting for duty at the Oasis, too?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'While the person seems young, they seem well-trained. Well-trained by Ballard himself, Watanabe senses the same aura in the way this person carries themselves.'}
{2: 'Yes, well, sort of...', 3: '107'}
{2: "I mean, I'm actually on my way there to see someone.", 3: '108'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory41.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Why do I have to deal with this on my first day?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe's brief encounter with the stranger doesn't make a significant impression on him, but what happens after he arrives at the camp is enough to mark the day as unusual."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Instructor', 3: "Enough with your BS. Either you get in the simulation pod yourself, or I'll tie you up and put you in.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Instructor', 3: "I'll write a report worse comes to worst. No one bothers reading those things anyway, though, so I usually just ask my lieutenant to write them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Instructor', 3: 'I see Ballard trained you for 8 years, huh? Want to show me what you got?', 4: '1'}
